00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_WII_BROWSER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_WII_BROWSER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 using namespace lubyk;
00034 
00035 #include "wii/Remote.h"
00036 
00037 namespace wii {
00038 
00044 class Browser : public LuaObject {
00045   class Implementation;
00046   Implementation *impl_;
00047   friend class Implementation;
00048   size_t need_count_;
00049   bool need_more_;
00050 public:
00051   Browser();
00052 
00053   ~Browser();
00054 
00057   void find();
00058 
00062   wii::Remote *found(const char *name) {
00063     lua_State *L = lua_;
00064     if (!pushLuaCallback("found")) {
00065       printf("Remote found without browser callback.\n");
00066       return NULL;
00067     }
00068 
00069     lua_pushstring(L, name);
00070     // <func> <self> <name>
00071     int status = lua_pcall(L, 2, 1, 0);
00072 
00073     if (status) {
00074       printf("Error in 'found' callback: %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00075       return NULL;
00076     }
00077 
00078     try {
00079       if (lua_type(L, -1) == LUA_TNIL) {
00080         // no wii.Remote.. cannot link
00081         lua_pop(L, 1);
00082         return NULL;
00083       } else {
00084         need_count_--;
00085         need_more_ = (need_count_ > 0);
00086         wii::Remote **remote = (wii::Remote**)dubL_checksdata(L, -1, "wii.Remote");
00087         lua_pop(L, 1);
00088         return *remote;
00089       }
00090     } catch (std::exception &e) {
00091       printf("Error in 'found' callback: %s\n", e.what());
00092       lua_pop(L, 1);
00093       return NULL;
00094     }
00095   }
00096 
00099   bool needMore() {
00100     return need_more_;
00101   }
00102 
00105   void findMore();
00106 };
00107 } // wii
00108 
00109 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_WII_BROWSER_H_
